title: Alan Wake 2 Gameplay w/ Developer Commentary
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Download the DoorDash app and enter code KINDA to get 50% off your first order (up to a $20 value) and zero delivery fees.

Blessing sits down with Sam Lake from Remedy Games to play a slice of Alan Wake 2 for the very first time!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
